resource.title: Tropical Pest & Mold Defense Matrix
resource.description: Seasonal maintenance schedule for preventing pest infestations and mold growth that can tank your listing reviews.
resource.painPoint: A single bad review about a cockroach or moldy smell can tank a listing. Preventive maintenance is often reactive rather than proactive.
keyFeatures: "Sugar Ant" Protocol: Deep clean schedule for hidden crumb zones (toaster, coffee maker)
Mold Patrol: Guidelines for humidity management (AC Dry Mode usage) and furniture spacing
Termite Watch: Visual guide to identifying "mud tubes"
Monsoon Prep: Waterproofing terraces and clearing drains before rains
